author: Lani H
text: One of my favorite parts about living in Louisville: in the summer trying to discern which pops are fireworks and which are gunshots.   If I still drank frequently, I would make it a drinking game where every time you hear a gun go off you take a shot of 1800.

author: Lani H
text: Is anyone else fan girl-ing super hard over @elonmusk right now?  Asking for a friend.
